WITH P AS ( SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(PATH_BASE,'\','/') AS FULL_PATH FROM TB_DRAWING_DOC WHERE 1 = 1
AND DOC_ST = 'A'
AND PATH_BASE IS NOT NULL
AND CREATED_AT BETWEEN to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtFrom},'-','')) AND to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtTo},'-',''))+1
AND SALES_CD LIKE '%'||#{salesCd}||'%'
), N AS ( -- 최대 폴더 깊이 만큼 조정 SELECT LEVEL AS LV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 50 ) SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN N.LV = 1 THEN '#' ELSE SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV-1) - 1) END AS PARENT, SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1) AS ID, CASE WHEN N.LV = 1 THEN SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, 1) - 1) ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1), '[^/]+$') END AS TEXT, NULL AS DOC_ID, NULL AS DOC_NO, NULL AS FILE_NAME, SUBSTR(P.FULL_PATH, 1, INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) - 1) AS PATH_BASE, 0 AS IS_LEAF, 'unit' AS TYPE, 'Y' AS CODE_ETC FROM P JOIN N ON INSTR(P.FULL_PATH||'/', '/', 1, N.LV) > 0 ORDER BY ID

WITH BASE AS ( SELECT T.DOC_ID AS FILE_KEY , T.DOC_NO AS DOC_NO , T.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME , T.EXT AS FILE_TYPE , '' AS FILE_SIZE , REPLACE(T.PATH_BASE,'\','/') AS LPATH , TO_CHAR(T.CREATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , T.CREATED_BY AS CREAT_NM , T.ACTIVE_VER AS VER_NO
, '' AS CLNT_NM , '' AS PRJCT_NM , '' AS PRDT_NM , '' AS ITEM_NM , T.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD , A.FILE_SIZE , A.VER_NO FROM TB_DRAWING_DOC T LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DRAWING_VERSION AS A ON T.DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID AND T.ACTIVE_VER = A.VER_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.DOC_ST = 'A'
AND REPLACE(T.PATH_BASE,'\','/') = #{comonCd}
AND T.CREATED_AT BETWEEN to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtFrom},'-','')) AND to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtTo},'-',''))+1
AND T.SALES_CD LIKE '%'||#{salesCd}||'%'
) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.FILE_NAME) AS RN FROM BASE B )
